thread.title: 4 Injured As Speeding SUV Rams Into Multiple Vehicles In Patna, Local Set Car Ablaze | India News - News18
thread.title_full: 4 Injured As Speeding SUV Rams Into Multiple Vehicles In Patna, Local Set Car Ablaze | India News - News18

author: Ranu Joardar
title: 4 Injured As Speeding SUV Rams Into Multiple Vehicles In Patna, Local Set Car Ablaze | India News - News18
text: Four people, including a woman, were injured when a speeding SUV rammed into multiple vehicles in Danapur, Patna, police said. Officials said that the incident took place on the roadside near the Gola Road T-point. “A Thar hit a few vehicles on the roadside near Gola Road T-point, in which four people got injured, including one woman. All four injured individuals have been sent to the hospital for treatment," Danapur SHO Prashant Kumar Bhardwaj said to the media. He further said that following the incident locals set the car on fire. “The fire was brought under control with the help of the fire brigade. Two cycles and two motorcycles have been recovered in a damaged condition. Further information will be obtained from CCTV footage," he said. Police said that the driver of the SUV has not been identified yet as the vehicle’s registration number was destroyed in the fire, ANI reported. “The vehicle owner is being identified based on the engine number," Danapur SHO said, adding that further investigation is ongoing.
